“Ho-sea Hussey,” said Ethan. “So, Melville’s having fun with these names.”

“I think it’s pronounced Ho-zay-uh.” 

“Ho-zay-uh Hussey. Hmm, not as fun to say.”

“It means he who saves.”

“What does Ishmael mean?”

“God who hears.” 

“Do we know why Melville chose these names?”

“What about Queequeg?”

“I don’t know about Queequeg.”
